rukus.text: felemma fesale talutu bilcunudi kale inne-llahe mubtelikum bineher. femen seribe minhu feleyse minni. vemel lem yat`amhu feinnehu minni illa meni-gterafe gurfetem biyedih. feseribu minhu illa kalilem minhum. felemma cavezehu huve vellezine amenu me`ahu kalu la takate lene-lyevme bicalute vecunudih. kale-llezine yezunnune ennehum mulaku-llahi kem min fietin kaliletin galebet fieten kesiratem biizni-llah. vellahu me`a-ssabirin
velemma berazu licalute vecunudihi kalu rabbena efrig `aleyna sabrav vesebbit akdamena vensurna `ale-lkavmi-lkafirin

fehezemuhum biizni-llahi vekatele davudu calute veatahu-llahu-lmulke velhikmete ve`allemehu mimma yesa'. velevla def`u-llahi-nnase ba`dahum biba`dil lefesedeti-l'ardu velakinne-llahe zu fadlin `ale-l`alemin
tilke ayatu-llahi netluha `aleyke bilhakk. veinneke lemine-lmurselin

tilke-rrusulu feddalna ba`dahum `ala ba`d. minhum men kelleme-llahu verafe`a ba`dahum deracat. veateyna `ise-bne meryeme-lbeyyinati veeyyednahu biruhi-lkudus. velev sae-llahu me-ktetele-llezine mim ba`dihim mim ba`di ma caethumu-lbeyyinatu velakini-htelefu feminhum men amene veminhum men kefer. velev sae-llahu me-ktetelu velakinne-llahe yef`alu ma yurid
